comments.body: Instead of comparing as String, could you update the Row.equals() to handle NaN (we need to do this eventually)?
comments.diffHunk:

+        sortAnswers = false,
+        compareStrings = true

comments.body: Yeah, good point; I'll just roll the equality changes into this patch.
